medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports abdominal pain starting in the epigastric area, migrating to the suprapubic area, and then to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Pain has been present since the afternoon prior to admission. There was one episode of non-bilious non-bloody emesis. Normal bowel movements and passing flatus noted. Denies fever, chills, or dysuria/hematuria.
